disabled.description: Determines whether child Pill components should be disabled
disabled.description_zh: 确定是否应禁用子 Pill 组件

gap.description: Controls spacing between pills, by default controlled by size
gap.description_zh: 控制胶囊之间的间距，默认情况下由大小控制

size.description: Controls size of the child Pill components and gap between them, 'sm' by default
size.description_zh: 控制子 Pill 组件的大小和它们之间的间隙，默认为 'sm'
